Get data from Planit API

Source: R/planit.R
get_planit_data.Rd

This function requests data from [planit.org.uk](https://www.planit.org.uk). See their [API spec](https://www.planit.org.uk/api/) and their [data dictionary](https://www.planit.org.uk/dictionary/) for further information.

get_planit_data(
  query_type = "applics",
  query_value = NULL,
  fmt = "geojson",
  base_url = "https://dev.planit.org.uk",
  limit = 6,
  end_date = as.character(Sys.Date()),
  start_date = "2000-02-01",
  auth = NULL,
  pcode = NULL,
  krad = NULL,
  bbox = NULL,
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

query_type

The type of query (`"applics"` by default)
query_value

Text string associated with the `query_type`. To be used only when `query_type` is not `"applics"`.
fmt

The format of the output (`"geojson"` returns an `sf` object, `"json"` returns a data frame)
base_url

The base URL of the service
limit

How many items to return (e.g. 6, default)
end_date

E.g. `"2009-02-01"`. Default is `as.character(Sys.Date())`.
start_date

The earliest application (date of application) to be filtered `"2000-02-01"`
auth

Authority name
pcode

Postcode = UK postcode to use for the centre of a location search
krad

Radius (km) = only planning applications within the circle perimeter are returned (default 2)
bbox

Bounding box in the form of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, e.g.: `c(-1.3, 53.7, -1.2, 53.9)`
silent

Do you want a message? Default is `FALSE`

Value

A (geographic) data frame

Examples

bbox = c(-1.4, 53.7, -1.3, 53.8)
res = get_planit_data(bbox = bbox, silent = FALSE) # return geographic (`sf`) object
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=6&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-03-05&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=6
class(res)
#> [1] "sf"         "tbl_df"     "tbl"        "data.frame"
names(res)
#>  [1] "address"        "app_size"       "app_state"      "app_type"      
#>  [5] "authority_id"   "authority_name" "description"    "lat"           
#>  [9] "link"           "lng"            "name"           "postcode"      
#> [13] "rec_type"       "source_url"     "start_date"     "uid"           
#> [17] "url"            "when_updated"   "associated_id"  "geometry"      
plot(res)
#> Warning: plotting the first 10 out of 19 attributes; use max.plot = 19 to plot all
get_planit_data(fmt = "json", limit = 2, bbox = bbox) # return data frame with limit
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-03-05&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2
#>                                               address app_size app_state
#> 1            14 Lyndon Avenue Garforth Leeds LS25 1DZ    Small Undecided
#> 2 Rustic Villa Leeds Road Cutsyke Castleford WF10 5ET    Small Undecided
#>   app_type authority_id authority_name
#> 1  Outline          292          Leeds
#> 2    Other          293      Wakefield
#>                                                                                                                               description
#> 1 Certificate of Proposed Lawful Development for a dormer window to the rear and rooflights to the front, new side window to ground floor
#> 2                                                                        Demolition of 1no. three bedroom dwelling and associated garages

#> 1 53.79304     https://dev.planit.org.uk/planapplic/Leeds/20/01275/CLP/

#>         lng                   name postcode   rec_type
#> 1 -1.389420     Leeds/20/01275/CLP LS25 1DZ PlanApplic

#> 1 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?keyVal=Q6ARKEJBKW000&activeTab=summary

#> 1 2020-03-03T00:15:12.846000+00:00
#> 2 2020-03-03T10:21:47.792000+00:00
get_planit_data(fmt = "json", limit = 2, auth = "leeds")
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=2&bbox=&end_date=2020-03-05&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2&auth=leeds
#>                                     address app_size app_state app_type

#> 1 2020-03-04 20/01372/CLP
#> 2 2020-03-04  20/00146/FU

#> 1 2020-03-05T02:13:33.677000+00:00
#> 2 2020-03-05T02:13:33.678000+00:00
get_planit_data(end_date = "2008-01-01", limit = 2, bbox = bbox) # historic data
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2008-01-01&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2

#> #   geometry <POINT [°]>
get_planit_data(pcode = "LS2 9JT", limit = 2, bbox = bbox) # data from specific postcode
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.4%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-03-05&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2&pcode=LS2%209JT

#> #   planning_url <chr>, iso31662_code <chr>, n_applications <int>,
#> #   linked_regions <list>, geometry <POLYGON [°]>
planitareas = get_planit_data(query_type = "areas", limit = 2)
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/areas/geojson?pg_sz=2
